RandomGradientDescent<RESIDUAL extends IRingElement> - Class in org.jlinalg.optimise
An implementation of an optimiser: Among the parameters, one is randomly choosen and then this dimension is searched along the gradient with a decreasing step size if the residual does not decreases.
RandomGradientDescent(Target<RESIDUAL>) - Constructor for class org.jlinalg.optimise.RandomGradientDescent
Initialise the optimiser.
RandomGradientDescent.Worker - Class in org.jlinalg.optimise
the actual optimiser (a thread)

Demonstrates the use of a RandomGradientDescent to optimise Function.
